pullrequest.title: Model submission for X1 sensor configuration 6.

content.raw:
I don’t actually use this functionality, I believe this was added by Addisu on a parallel PR and I added it to this one as well to mirror his work.

‌

I’ve been testing with launch files from [this PR](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/343/modications-to-ignition-launch-files-to/diff) \(i.e. \`competition.ign\`\) for spawning in a way that competitors would use. The changes to `competition.ign` may or may not be in this PR due to it being based off `urban_circuit` before that PR was merged in.
content.html:
I don’t actually use this functionality, I believe this was added by Addisu on a parallel PR and I added it to this one as well to mirror his work.

‌

I’ve been testing with launch files from this PR (i.e. `competition.ign`) for spawning in a way that competitors would use. The changes to competition.ign may or may not be in this PR due to it being based off urban_circuit before that PR was merged in.
